decisions.title: Auto payment for Tuition
decisions.description: Your Tuition payment will be auto deducted in 2 days:  $1,000.00, from your Suntrust Checking Account 96xx.  Currently you have $54.37 in this account.  In 1 day there will be a direct deposit of $5200.00.

decisions.title: Auto renewal for Amazon Prime
decisions.description: Your Prime membership will renew tonight at midnight (EST) and will deduct $99.00 from your Suntrust Checking Account 96xx.  Currently you have $54.37 in this account.
